items.sentence: I used to dream about becoming an astronaut.
We don\'t know what the future holds for us.
We don\'t know what they want to use it for.
We don\'t know whether Tom is dead or alive.
I was waiting for Tom to tell me what to do.
Tom told his friends that he never ate meat.
Tom told me he and Mary had gotten divorced.
Tom told me he had to go back to the office.
I wonder how much time we\'ve wasted so far.
Tom told Mary he\'d pick her up around 2:30.
I don\'t care what Tom says. I\'m not going.
Tom wasn\'t the one who asked me to do that.
Tom wasn\'t the only student who was absent.
Tom has something to discuss with all of us.
Tom has started giving guitar lessons again.
Tom has started to show an interest in Mary.
You\'re afraid that I\'m right, aren\'t you?
I asked Tom how long he had lived in Boston.
Tom was diagnosed with tuberculosis in 2013.
Tom was eating lunch with Mary at that time.
